name: Star Wars Inspired Open World Space Game
name_original: Star Wars Inspired Open World Space Game
description:
One of my favorite projects, a massive scale open world space game taking place across two planets with many features already complete. Simple FPS controls, click to shoot and destroy droids, click on some buildings to destroy them, good fun. Nearby your spawn there is a tie fighter, you can get in and explore both the planet you are on and the other ominous planet in the distance.

more planned in the future!
